name: 第谷·布拉赫
bio_short: 丹麦天文学家，被誉为“观测天文学之王”。他在没有望远镜的情况下，进行了长达20年超高精度的天文观测，其海量数据为开普勒定律奠定了基础。
bio_short_en: A Danish astronomer known as the 'king of observational astronomy'. He conducted 20 years of hyper-accurate, naked-eye observations, and his massive dataset became the foundation for Kepler's laws.
